articles.title: A better DART mission for asteroid deflection? Know what NASA says - HT Tech
articles.description: The NASA DART mission demonstrated single impact style event but a new paper is offering an intriguing and probably efficient and precise method in safeguarding Earth from potential asteroid impacts.
articles.content: The threat of asteroids hitting the Earth is always present and scientists have been working for decades now to track them and to devise the methods to deflect them or otherwise neutralize any threat… [+2842 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Cruise slashes 24% of self-driving car workforce in sweeping layoffs - TechCrunch
articles.description: Cruise, the GM self-driving car subsidiary, is laying off 900 workers to slash costs and revamp the company, TechCrunch exclusively learned.

articles.title: Heading toward the Sun, Aditya-L1 mission camera took stunning image of Earth and Moon - HT Tech
articles.description: Aditya-L1 mission, India's first solar observatory, captured an image of Earth and Moon on its way to study the Sun's mysteries in this groundbreaking Sun project.

articles.title: Asia Predatory Lending Apps Claim Victims by Offering Easy Money - Bloomberg
articles.description: Authorities and tech companies are in a game of cat and mouse with criminals who use apps to extract sensitive information and money from people looking to borrow.
articles.content: The trouble often starts with social media ads. Get a $500 personal loan in 20 minutes, the ads on Facebook or Instagram say. No documentation needed, just download this app. When prospective borrowe… [+851 chars]
